title: Bug 18285: Doubleclicking on import statement transfers to referenced type
OB: When doubleclicking on a type import statement in the package view outline, the editor opens on the target type instead of the unit hosting the import reference.
EB: Currently, when doubleclicking on a type import statement in the package view outline, the editor opens on the target type instead of the unit hosting the import reference.
SR: Ensure that when doubleclicking on a type import statement in the package view outline, the editor opens on the unit hosting the import reference instead of the target type.
